'''0.0.16a_01'''<ref>{{link|url=http://www.munio-minecraft.cz/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/minecraft-2009-by-ez-6.jpg|title=minecraft-2009-by-ez-6.jpg|dead-url=yes|archive-url=http://web.archive.org/web/20180321192321/http://www.munio-minecraft.cz/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/minecraft-2009-by-ez-6.jpg}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 7, 2009, at around 18:10 UTC.<ref name=":0">[[wordofnotch:120096050|"New server up"]] – The Word of Notch, June 8, 2009</ref><ref name=package>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[12:09] <@Notch> there's a bug in the network connection''" [...] "''[12:09] <sppt> are you fixing it notch? :o''" [...] "''[12:09] <@Notch> yes''" [...] "''[12:10] <m0tive> downloading new package...''" (18:09 to 18:10 UTC)</ref>

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Commands]]'''
* Renamed {{cmd|broadcast}} to {{cmd|say}}.<ref name=":0"/>

'''[[Multiplayer]]'''

'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed a network connection bug.<ref name="package"/>
